messages.message:
Crafting EKS cluster is unavailable:

```cs/mfichman❯ kubectl config use-context crafting-aihub
Switched to context "crafting-aihub".
cs/mfichman❯ kubectl get pods
E0403 20:58:49.359641 1819923 memcache.go:265] "Unhandled Error" err="couldn't get current server API group list: Get \"http://crafting-aihub.k8s.g.sandbox/api?timeout=32s\": net/http: request canceled (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers)"```
This could be why @Weiming Wu is having trouble. Paging @sean.donohoe :slightly_smiling_face:
The `crafting-aihub` cluster has been pretty unstable lately; do we know why yet?
cc @Ashish can we get more eyes on this, it’ll start impacting a lot of developers
